channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: flake8-cached (0.2)
item.description: A wrapper around flake8's cli that uses cache at file level
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pyprojecttoml (0.0.2)
item.description: Inject pyproject.toml support into flake8.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-deprecated (2.0.1)
item.description: Warns about deprecated method calls.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-plone-api (1.5)
item.description: Checks for code usages that can be replaced with Plone API method calls.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: types-flake8-builtins (2)
item.description: Typing stubs for flake8-builtins
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-deprecated (2)
item.description: Warns about deprecated method calls.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-plone-hasattr (1)
item.description: Checks for hasattr, which is considered harmful in Plone projects.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-picky-parentheses (0.3.1)
item.description: flake8 plugin to nitpick about parenthesis, brackets, and braces

item.title: Updated: flake8-pep3101 (2)
item.description: Checks for old string formatting.

item.title: Updated: flake8-newspaper-style (0.4.2)
item.description: Check code for newspaper style

item.title: Updated: flake8-builtins (2)
item.description: Check for python builtins being used as variables or parameters.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.description: flake8 plugin that integrates isort .

item.description: flake8 plugin to nitpick about parenthesis, brackets, and braces

item.description: Check code for newspaper style

item.title: Updated: flake8-too-many (0.1.5)
